content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining coal
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) collecting coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5) moving coal

### Copper Production Line at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0) smelting copper plates
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) storing plates

### Iron Production Line at position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0) smelting iron plates
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) storing plates

### Power Generation System at position(-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks (fluid systems 3935, 3937)
- Electric network connecting various machines (id 6954)

### Science Pack Production at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 producing automation science packs
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials
- Connected belt system for material transport
- Lab researching logistics technology

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in container before attempting extraction
- Check container inventory contents before extraction attempts
- Use proper error handling when items are not available

### Errors with furnace operations
- Ensure furnace has both fuel and ore before attempting to extract products
- Wait for smelting process to complete before attempting to extract plates

### Entity placement and connection issues
- Verify entity positions and connections when setting up production lines
- Ensure proper spacing between entities for inserter operations

### Resource management
- Monitor resource levels in storage chests
- Set up reliable supply chains for critical materials
- Keep track of fuel levels in burner-powered entities
